idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3500

descript.abstract: Inventory of absent and existing sidewalks, driveways and crosswalks for the City of Austin.
descript.purpose: Use in the Pedestrian Information Management System (PIMS) by the City of Austin.

citeinfo.origin: Sanborn, Inc. and Lockwood, Andrews & Newnam, Inc.
citeinfo.title: TRANSPORTATION.sidewalk_network_2006

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.0.2414
dataIdInfo.idPurp: Use in the Pedestrian Information Management System (PIMS) by the City of Austin.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: Inventory of absent and existing sidewalks, driveways and crosswalks for the City of Austin.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

procstep.procdesc: Absent sidewalks, existing sidewalks, absent curb ramps, existing curb ramps, crosswalks and driveways were digitized using 2003 aerial imagery from the City of Austin. Digitization was performed by Sanborn, Inc.
